settings.label: Hide collection
settings.info: Enter collection handles separated by commas, e.g., 'collection-handle-1,collection-handle-2' to hide from collection list and from search result.

settings.label: Theme accent
settings.info: Show on system status bar on mobile

settings.label: Show Loading Animation
settings.info: Animation will show on page load.

settings.label: Text
settings.info: Display when no image select.

settings.content: Use square brackets [] around text that you would like to look 'Fancy Text 1' & normal brakets (()) around text for 'Fancy Text 2'.
For Example [Text] will change color acording to 'Fancy Text 1' and ((Text)) will change color acording to 'Fancy Text 2'
You can change text in every section where it says 'âœ¨ Fancy enabled'

settings.label: Base Text Size
settings.info: Set custom base size for highlight text. Base size is affected by section text size setting.

settings.label: Slide ATC Into View
settings.info: Slides into view when default ATC button scrolls off screen

settings.label: Show Cart Button Only
settings.info: This will show cart button only and hide everything else

settings.label: Button Text
settings.info: Leave blank to show default add to cart text.

settings.label: Enable test mode
settings.info: This option keeps the drawer opened by default for faster customization. Remember to uncheck this after finish editing.

settings.label: Continue Shopping Link

settings.content: Edit cart progress bar in Theme settings > Cart Progress Bar or [here](/editor?context=theme&category=Cart Progress Bar).
Edit upsell products in Theme settings > Cart Upsell or [here](/editor?context=theme&category=Cart Upsell).
Edit checkbox upsell products in Theme settings > Cart Checkbox Upsell or [here](/editor?context=theme&category=Cart Checkbox Upsell).

settings.label: Cart Heading
settings.info: t:settings_schema.lumin-freeshipping-bar.settings.inline_richtext.info_2

settings.label: Show full size buttons
settings.info: If uncheck, buttons will show in single line to save space where possible
Enable and edit cart upsell checkbox in [theme settings](/editor?context=theme&category=Cart Checkbox Upsell)
Cart note corner radius
settings.label: t:settings_schema.global.settings.corner_radius.label
Payment Methods
settings.info: Add the payment method keys separated by (,) commas. (e.g., visa,master,paypal,apple_pay). You can find all payment methods [here](https://lumintheme.com/pages/payment-method-list).

settings.label: Use Items Subtotal for Progress Bar
Goal 1
settings.info: Comma-separated list of currencies with their respective goal value. E.g USD:100, EUR:90. Leave empty to disable

settings.label: Goal 1 Pre-Goal Message
settings.info: Use [x] to insert the dynamic remaining amount.

settings.label: Goal 1 Post-Goal Message
settings.info: Message displayed after reaching Goal 1.

settings.label: Goal 1 Description
settings.info: Text displayed beneath Goal 1 icon. Use [goal] as placeholder to display goal amount.

settings.label: Goal 2
settings.info: Comma-separated list of currencies with their respective goal value. E.g USD:100, EUR:90. Leave empty to disable

settings.label: Goal 2 Pre-Goal Message
settings.default: You're only [x] away from a 20% Off
settings.info: Use [x] to insert the dynamic remaining amount.

settings.label: Goal 2 Post-Goal Message
settings.default: ðŸŽ‰ Congrats! You've unlocked your 20% Off
settings.info: Message displayed after reaching Goal 2.

settings.label: Goal 2 Description
settings.info: Text displayed beneath Goal 2 icon. Use [goal] as placeholder to display goal amount.

settings.label: Goal 3
settings.info: Comma-separated list of currencies with their respective goal value. E.g USD:100, EUR:90. Leave empty to disable

settings.label: Goal 3 Pre-Goal Message
settings.info: Use [x] to insert the dynamic remaining amount.

settings.label: Goal 3 Post-Goal Message
settings.info: Message displayed after reaching Goal 3.

settings.label: Goal 3 Description
settings.info: Text displayed beneath Goal 3 icon. Use [goal] as placeholder to display goal amount.

Adjust colors, speed or font style of scrolling product tags above product cards. Use [this](https://help.lumintheme.com/lumin-theme-documentation/how-to-setup-product-cards-scrolling-tags-and-custom-badges) guide to add product tags

settings.label: Badge Text
settings.info: Use [$] to display sale "Amount" & [%] to display sale "Percentage". Leave blank to show default.

Adjust colors of custom product badges for product cards. Use [this](https://help.lumintheme.com/lumin-theme-documentation/how-to-setup-product-cards-scrolling-tags-and-custom-badges) guide to add product badges, Add product tag in following format 'Badge1:your text here', 'Badge2:your text here', 'Badge3:your text here'
